rows.name: Two Colors

block1_text.eng: Draw small number of lines across an oval or rectangle. Can the result always be colored with 2 colors?

rows.block1_text: Draw small number of lines across an oval or rectangle. Can the result always be colored with 2 colors?

rows.name: Squares on a Board

block1_text.eng: How many squares in an nxn chessboard? How many rectangles on an nxm board? What about if diagonals are allowed?

rows.block1_text: How many squares in an nxn chessboard? How many rectangles on an nxm board? What about if diagonals are allowed?

rows.name: Eight Cubes

block1_text.eng: There are 8 cubes of the same size. Two are red, two are blue, two are green, and two are white. How many ways can these 8 cubes be put together to form a larger cube so that the larger cube has every color on its face?

rows.block1_text: There are 8 cubes of the same size. Two are red, two are blue, two are green, and two are white. How many ways can these 8 cubes be put together to form a larger cube so that the larger cube has every color on its face?

rows.name: Combining Bugs

block1_text.eng: There are beetles, lizards, and worms. The number of worms is more than the combined total of beetles and lizards. There are 12 heads and 26 legs. How many of each one are there? What if we increase the numbers a lot? What if there are lizards, beetles, and spiders?

rows.block1_text: There are beetles, lizards, and worms. The number of worms is more than the combined total of beetles and lizards. There are 12 heads and 26 legs. How many of each one are there? What if we increase the numbers a lot? What if there are lizards, beetles, and spiders?

rows.name: Leapfrog

block1_text.eng: There are 11 holes in a row. There are 5 black pegs in the holes at one end and 5 white pegs in holes on the other end and one empty hole in the middle. A peg can only be moved to an empty hole or jump over another peg into an empty hole. Can the white and black pegs swap ends?

rows.block1_text: There are 11 holes in a row. There are 5 black pegs in the holes at one end and 5 white pegs in holes on the other end and one empty hole in the middle. A peg can only be moved to an empty hole or jump over another peg into an empty hole. Can the white and black pegs swap ends?

rows.name: A Heavy Desk

block1_text.eng: A very heavy desk can only be moved by rotating it 90 degrees about one of its four corners. Is it possible to move it so that it is exactly next to its old position and still facing in the same direction?

rows.block1_text: A very heavy desk can only be moved by rotating it 90 degrees about one of its four corners. Is it possible to move it so that it is exactly next to its old position and still facing in the same direction?

rows.name: Adding to 15

block1_text.eng: 9 pieces of paper with the numbers 1 to 9 are placed on a table. Players take turns taking a piece of paper. The first player to get a sum of 15 using any three of their numbers wins. What is a winning strategy (if there is one)?

rows.block1_text: 9 pieces of paper with the numbers 1 to 9 are placed on a table. Players take turns taking a piece of paper. The first player to get a sum of 15 using any three of their numbers wins. What is a winning strategy (if there is one)?
